attributes.action: demand further investigation and searching by the police and other forces around the world to locate missing girl Madaleine McCann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Madaleine McCann is Alive, Madalaine McCann is Dead.. nobody knows for sure, and if we've still got time to find her, lets not waste precious time, get out there with all our resources and find her before it's too late. Lets give Madalaines parents some more hope that their daughter will be returned to them safe and well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
